  • Uses of CloseHandler in org.patternfly.handler

    Methods in org.patternfly.handler with parameters of type CloseHandler
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <C> void
    CloseHandler.fireEvent(C component, CloseHandler<C> closeHandler, Event event, boolean fireEvent)
    Helper method which calls onClose(Event, Object), if fireEvent is true and a close handler has been defined.
    static <C> boolean
    CloseHandler.shouldClose(C component, CloseHandler<C> closeHandler, Event event, boolean fireEvent)
    Helper method which returns the result of shouldClose(Event, Object), if fireEvent is true and a close handler has been defined, otherwise true.
